title: Is the Bhagavad Gita advisable for an 18-year-old? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes.. It is advisable… It's advisable that the earlier you read the better… It's a life instructions…earlier you know your life will be better… In a game, it's always better to go to the instruction created by the game designer…before starting the game. Similarly….it's always better to know the instructions of gita….the direction which gita provides, can never be seen of even heard in any other book. Gita…teaches everything..in every dimension. So earlier you get it…u should feel more luckier your. Gita, is a blessing!! Earlier you get, better it is….!! Thank you for asking..
sure.It is the best book for book for people of all ages provided you read it with patience . Don't read it like a novel or poetry to Enjoy.It is for you to read , understand and ponder over.
